languages.text: "Несомненно, предателей нужно казнить. Все их слова о тирании Тисифоны — лишь прикрытие собственной корысти и желания захватить власть над Домом. Они ненавидели Тисифону? Пускай. Но в чем повинна я? Или вы и ваши люди?"

traits.locale_text: "Несомненно, предателей нужно казнить. Все их слова о тирании Тисифоны — лишь прикрытие собственной корысти и желания захватить власть над Домом. Они ненавидели Тисифону? Пускай. Но в чем повинна я? Или вы и ваши люди?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, предателей нужно казнить. Все их слова о тирании Тисифоны — лишь прикрытие собственной корысти и желания захватить власть над Домом. Они ненавидели Тисифону? Пускай. Но в чем повинна я? Или вы и ваши люди?"

traits.locale_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors should be executed. All their words about Tisiphone's tyranny are just a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. They hated Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “毫无疑问，这些叛徒必须被处决。他们对提西福涅暴政的一切控诉，不过是为了掩盖他们的个人私欲，为了掩盖他们渴望夺得家族大权的动机。他们憎恨提西福涅吗？或许是这样，但我并没有做过任何对不起他们的事情，你的人也没有做过。”
languages.original_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，这些叛徒必须被处决。他们对提西福涅暴政的一切控诉，不过是为了掩盖他们的个人私欲，为了掩盖他们渴望夺得家族大权的动机。他们憎恨提西福涅吗？或许是这样，但我并没有做过任何对不起他们的事情，你的人也没有做过。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No me cabe duda de que los traidores deben ser ejecutados. Todas sus quejas sobre la tiranía de Tisiphone son solo una excusa para su interés propio y sus ansias de apoderarse de la casa. ¿Acaso tienen motivos para odiar a Tisiphone? Es posible. Pero yo no les he hecho nada malo, y su gente tampoco».
languages.original_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."

traits.locale_text: «No me cabe duda de que los traidores deben ser ejecutados. Todas sus quejas sobre la tiranía de Tisiphone son solo una excusa para su interés propio y sus ansias de apoderarse de la casa. ¿Acaso tienen motivos para odiar a Tisiphone? Es posible. Pero yo no les he hecho nada malo, y su gente tampoco».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「裏切り者は処刑されなければなりません。ティシフォンの暴政に対する彼らの不満はすべて、彼らの私利私欲と家の権力を掌握したいという欲望の隠れ蓑に過ぎません。彼らはティシフォンを憎んでいたのでしょうか？そうかもしれません。ですが、あたくしは彼らを憎んではいません。{name}様の仲間もそのはずです」
languages.original_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者は処刑されなければなりません。ティシフォンの暴政に対する彼らの不満はすべて、彼らの私利私欲と家の権力を掌握したいという欲望の隠れ蓑に過ぎません。彼らはティシフォンを憎んでいたのでしょうか？そうかもしれません。ですが、あたくしは彼らを憎んではいません。{name}様の仲間もそのはずです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Es kann kein Zweifel daran bestehen, dass die Verräter hingerichtet werden müssen. Ihre ganzen Beschwerden über Tisiphones Tyrannei sind nur eine Ausrede für ihre eigenen Interessen und ihren Wunsch, die Macht über das Haus an sich zu reißen. Haben sie Tisiphone gehasst? Möglich. Aber ich habe ihnen nichts getan, genauso wenig wie Eure Leute."
languages.original_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."

traits.locale_text: "Es kann kein Zweifel daran bestehen, dass die Verräter hingerichtet werden müssen. Ihre ganzen Beschwerden über Tisiphones Tyrannei sind nur eine Ausrede für ihre eigenen Interessen und ihren Wunsch, die Macht über das Haus an sich zu reißen. Haben sie Tisiphone gehasst? Möglich. Aber ich habe ihnen nichts getan, genauso wenig wie Eure Leute."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les traîtres doivent être exécutés, cela ne fait aucun doute. La prétendue tyrannie de Tisiphone n'est qu'un prétexte pour servir leurs propres intérêts et prendre le contrôle de la maison, car c'est bien là tout ce qu'ils cherchent. Haïssaient-ils Tisiphone ? Sans doute. Mais je ne leur ai jamais fait aucun mal, et vous non plus. »
languages.original_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."

traits.locale_text: « Les traîtres doivent être exécutés, cela ne fait aucun doute. La prétendue tyrannie de Tisiphone n'est qu'un prétexte pour servir leurs propres intérêts et prendre le contrôle de la maison, car c'est bien là tout ce qu'ils cherchent. Haïssaient-ils Tisiphone ? Sans doute. Mais je ne leur ai jamais fait aucun mal, et vous non plus. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hainlerin idam edilmesi gerek, buna şüphe yok. Tisiphone'nin tiranlığı hakkındaki tüm şikâyetleri, kendi çıkarları ve Hane'yi yönetme arzuları adına işledikleri suçlar için bir paravan yalnızca. Tisiphone'den nefret ediyorlar mıydı? Muhtemelen. Ben onlara yanlış bir şey yapmadım ama. Sen ve yanındakiler de yapmadınız."
languages.original_text: "There can be no doubt the traitors must be executed. All their complaints about Tisiphone's tyranny are merely a cover for their self-interest and their desire to seize power over the House. Did they hate Tisiphone? Perhaps. But I did not wrong them, and neither did your people."

traits.locale_text: "Hainlerin idam edilmesi gerek, buna şüphe yok. Tisiphone'nin tiranlığı hakkındaki tüm şikâyetleri, kendi çıkarları ve Hane'yi yönetme arzuları adına işledikleri suçlar için bir paravan yalnızca. Tisiphone'den nefret ediyorlar mıydı? Muhtemelen. Ben onlara yanlış bir şey yapmadım ama. Sen ve yanındakiler de yapmadınız."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
